document.full_text: a united auto workers trust fund will retain its shares of chrysler group llc in a bid to maximize returns for retiree healthcare costs rather than follow the obama administration in a quick exit of its investment, two people familiar with the fund's strategy said.
document.title: uaw trust not planning quick chrysler exit: sources
lines_and_colors: a united auto workers trust fund will retain its shares of chrysler group llc in a bid to maximize returns for retiree healthcare costs rather than follow the obama administration in a quick exit of its investment, two people familiar with the fund's strategy said.
